oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Treasurer of the United States report, 1909
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Treasurer of the United States
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Statement from Lee McClung, Retiring Treasurer of the United States. Nov. 22 & Dec. 3,1912. Printed with witness signatures. Reports government funds and securities amounting to $1,519,285,980.57 and 2/3 cents. Lee McClung (March 26, 1870-December 19, 1914) of Knox County, TN, was appointed the 22nd Treasurer of the United States, serving from 1909-1912.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Financial disclosure; Treasuries;
